text: Marc Spindler (born November 28, 1969) is a former American football player who was a defensive tackle and defensive end who played nine seasons in the National Football League. Since retiring from football, Spindler has worked for both WDFN and WXYT, two Detroit area sports talk radio stations. In 1986, Spindler was named USA Today High School Defensive Player of the Year. title: Marc Spindler
